## Overview
Very flexible build. The goal is to regenerate super energy to make use of Nighthawk's ability with precision damage.

**Light/Dark Subclass**
Solar - Way of the Sharpshooter (bottom tree)

**Strategy**
Ideally run with T10 intelligence to take advantage of the exotic perk. High discipline can help create wells to boost int regen speed. Pair with solar weapons to create solar wells.

**Armor Mods**
Elemental Armaments
Explosive Wellmaker
Font of Wisdom
Well of Ordnance
